scripts.build: pnpm --filter frontend build && pnpm --filter ranking-api build
scripts.deploy:api: pnpm --filter ranking-api build && pnpm --filter ranking-api exec wrangler deploy
scripts.deploy:frontend: VITE_APP_TITLE="$(cd pulumi && pulumi config get appTitle)" VITE_TURNSTILE_SITE_KEY="$(cd pulumi && pulumi stack output turnstileSiteKey)" VITE_API_BASE_URL="https://ranking-api.mparaz.workers.dev" pnpm --filter frontend build && pnpm --filter ranking-api exec wrangler pages deploy ../frontend/dist --project-name ranking-frontend --branch main
scripts.deploy:infra: pnpm --filter ranking-api build && cd pulumi && pulumi up --yes
